Compensation, VTS, Time, Feedback, Staffing Radar, Staffing Desk, SAP, Certent, UBS, CTC, Concur, CRS, FC Checklist, and HPAM. Based on this potential access, you are being asked to read, understand, and comply with the obligations set forth in this Agreement. This Agreement does not replace your information responsibilities as set out in EPAM'S overarching information governance policies, but reinforces some of the core requirements, given your position of trust within the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that failure to comply with this Agreement
